en: Fret not thyself because of evil-doers, Neither be thou envious against them that work unrighteousness.
hmr: Thil ṭha naw thawtuhai leiin insuklungngai nuom naw la, Fel nawtaka thawtuhai chu inhnar bawk naw rawh.

en: For they shall soon be cut down like the grass, And wither as the green herb.
hmr: Hlohna angin ât thlukin um vak an ta, Hna hring angin an vuoi ding a ni sih a.

en: Trust in Jehovah, and do good; Dwell in the land, and feed on his faithfulness.
hmr: LALPA chu ring la, thil ṭha thaw rawh, Hi rama hin um la, ringumna chu hnawt pei rawh.

en: Delight thyself also in Jehovah; And he will give thee the desires of thy heart.
hmr: LALPA chunga chun lâwm bawk la, Chuongchun, i lungril dit zâwnghai chu pêng a ti che.

en: Commit thy way unto Jehovah; Trust also in him, and he will bring it to pass.
hmr: I um dân ding chu LALPA chungah innghat la, Ama chu ring la, amain thaw vawng a tih.

en: And he will make thy righteousness to go forth as the light, And thy justice as the noonday.
hmr: I felzie chu var angin insuoktir a ta, I thiemchangzie khawm chu sûnlai ang elin.

en: Rest in Jehovah, and wait patiently for him: Fret not thyself because of him who prospereth in his way, Because of the man who bringeth wicked devices to pass.
hmr: LALPAA chun châwl la, ama chu nghâk fan fan rawh; Ama lampuia vângneina dawngtu lei chun insuklungngai nuom naw rawh, Ngaituo suolhai puitlintu lei chun.

en: Cease from anger, and forsake wrath: Fret not thyself, it tendeth only to evil-doing.
hmr: Lunginsen hi bânsan la, lungsenna chu sim rawh. Insuklungngai nuom naw, thil- suksuolah inchang thei a nih.

en: For evil-doers shall be cut off; But those that wait for Jehovah, they shall inherit the land.
hmr: Thil ṭha naw thawtuhai chu sukbohmangin an um ding a ni sih a, LALPA nghâktuhai ruok chun ram hi hluong an tih.

en: For yet a little while, and the wicked shall not be: Yea, thou shalt diligently consider his place, and he shall not be.
hmr: Sâwt nawtê hnungah mi rilo chu a um ta awm si nawh a, Anih, a umna hmun chu en en hman la khawm um ta naw ni.

en: But the meek shall inherit the land, And shall delight themselves in the abundance of peace.
hmr: Thuhnuoirawlhai ruok chun ram hi hluong an ta, Inremna nasatak chungah lâwm an tih.

en: The wicked plotteth against the just, And gnasheth upon him with his teeth.
hmr: Mi rilo chun mi fel a phier- rûk a, A ha a râwt khum hlak.

en: The Lord will laugh at him; For he seeth that his day is coming.
hmr: LALPA chun ama chu nuisan a ta, A ni a hung tlung ding a ni ti a hriet leiin.

en: The wicked have drawn out the sword, and have bent their bow, To cast down the poor and needy, To slay such as are upright in the way.
hmr: Rimsi le pasiehai sukthlu ding le, Umdân indikhai sukhlum dingin, Mi rilohai chun an kâwlhnâm an phawi a, an thalngul an kuoi bawk a.

en: Their sword shall enter into their own heart, And their bows shall be broken.
hmr: An kâwlhnâm chun anni lung chu sun a ta, An thalngulhai sukthliekin um bawk a tih.

en: Better is a little that the righteous hath Than the abundance of many wicked.
hmr: Mi fel thil tlâwmte nei chu, Mi rilo thil nei hnêr hnûr nêk chun a ṭha lem dai a nih.

en: For the arms of the wicked shall be broken; But Jehovah upholdeth the righteous.
hmr: Mi rilo bânhai chu sukthliekin a um ding a ni sih a, Mi fel ruok chu LALPAIN a chel zing hlak.

en: Jehovah knoweth the days of the perfect; And their inheritance shall be for ever.
hmr: LALPA chun mi ṭha famkim nihai chu a hriet a, An rohluo ding chu kumkhuoa um zing ding a nih.

en: They shall not be put to shame in the time of evil; And in the days of famine they shall be satisfied.
hmr: Hun ṭha nawah muolpho naw ni hai a, Ṭâm kumahai khawm khawp an tih.

en: But the wicked shall perish, And the enemies of Jehovah shall be as the fat of lambs: They shall consume; in smoke shall they consume away.
hmr: Mi rilohai ruok chu bohmang an ta, LALPA dotuhai khawm phûl hlohna inno ang nîng an ta, Sukbohmangin um an ta, meikhuah inzâm hmang an tih.

en: The wicked borroweth, and payeth not again; But the righteous dealeth graciously, and giveth.
hmr: Mi rilo chun a pûk a, a pêk nâwk ngai nawh a, Mi fel ruok chun mi a lunginsiet a, a pêk lem hlak.

en: For such as are blessed of him shall inherit the land; And they that are cursed of him shall be cut off.
hmr: A malsâwmna dawngtuhai chun ram hi hluong an ta, A ṭawngse phurtuhai chu sukbohmangin an um ding a nih.

en: A man’s goings are established of Jehovah; And he delighteth in his way.
hmr: LALPAIN mihriem chu a fena dingah a ṭhuoi hlak a, A kalchawi a ilâwm chu a sukdet hlak.

en: Though he fall, he shall not be utterly cast down; For Jehovah upholdeth him with his hand.
hmr: Tlu sienla khawm tlu letdêr chun um naw nih a, LALPAIN a kutin a chel zing sih a.

en: I have been young, and now am old; Yet have I not seen the righteous forsaken, Nor his seed begging bread.
hmr: Naupang ka lo ni tah a, tuhin tar ka ni tah a, Nisienlakhawm, mi fel chu mâksana a um ka hmu ngai nawh a, A thlahai bu dâwl khawm ka hmu ngai nawh.

en: All the day long he dealeth graciously, and lendeth; And his seed is blessed.
hmr: Sûnnithlâkin mi a lunginsiet a, ân pûktir hlak, A thlahai khawm an hamṭha hlak.

en: Depart from evil, and do good; And dwell for evermore.
hmr: Suol fe san la, thil ṭha thaw rawh, Chuongchun, kumkhuoin chêng zing rawh.

en: For Jehovah loveth justice, And forsaketh not his saints; They are preserved for ever: But the seed of the wicked shall be cut off.
hmr: LALPA chun rorêlna fel a ngaina sih a, A mi inthienghai chu a fesan ngai nawh a. Kumkhuoha dinga vawngṭhatin an um hlak a, Mi rilo thlahai ruok chu sukbohmangin um an tih.

en: The righteous shall inherit the land, And dwell therein for ever.
hmr: Mi felhai chun ram hi hluong an ta, A sûnga hin kumkhuoin um an tih.

en: The mouth of the righteous talketh of wisdom, And his tongue speaketh justice.
hmr: Mi fel bau chun varna thu a hril hlak a, A lei chun rorêl felna thu a hril bawk hlak.

en: The law of his God is in his heart; None of his steps shall slide.
hmr: A Pathien dân chu a lungrilah a um a, A ke pên hrim hrim chu intawl naw nih.

en: The wicked watcheth the righteous, And seeketh to slay him.
hmr: Mi rilo chun mi fel chu a enthlit a, Sukhlum a tum hlak.

en: Jehovah will not leave him in his hand, Nor condemn him when he is judged.
hmr: LALPAIN ama chu a kutah mâksan naw nih a, An ro a rêl pha chun thiemnaw inchangtir phal bawk naw ni.

en: Wait for Jehovah, and keep his way, And he will exalt thee to inherit the land: When the wicked are cut off, thou shalt see it.
hmr: LALPA chu nghâk la, a lampui chu hraw rawh, Chuongchun, ram chu hluo dingin chawimawi a ti che. Mi rilohai sukbohmanga an um lai chu la hmûng i tih.

en: I have seen the wicked in great power, And spreading himself like a green tree in its native soil.
hmr: Mi rilo chu nasataka thu neia, A mâwngna hmuna thing inder inno tak anga inbuk luoia a um lai ka hmuh a,

en: But one passed by, and, lo, he was not: Yea, I sought him, but he could not be found.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, lampuiah a va feh a; chun, ngai ta, ama chu a um ta nawh a. Anih, ka zawng a, nisienla- khawm, hmu zo a ni ta nawh.

en: Mark the perfect man, and behold the upright; For there is a happy end to the man of peace.
hmr: Mi demkailo inchik la, mi indiktak chu en rawh, Chuong ang mi tâwpna ding chu lungmuongna a ni ding a ni sih a.

en: As for transgressors, they shall be destroyed together: The end of the wicked shall be cut off.
hmr: Bawsetuhai ruok chu a ruola suksietin an um tâwl ding a na, Mi rilohai tâwpna ding chu sukbohmangna ning a tih.

en: But the salvation of the righteous is of Jehovah: He is their stronghold in the time of trouble.
hmr: Mi felhai sandamna ruok chu LALPA kuoma inthawk a ni a. Ama chu lunginzîng laia an kulbîng a ni hlak a.

en: And Jehovah helpeth them, and rescueth them: He rescueth them from the wicked, and saveth them, Because they have taken refuge in him.
hmr: LALPAIN anni chu a ṭhangpuiin a sanhim hlak a, Amaa chun an tlûklût leiin; Mi rilohaia inthawk chun a sanhimin a sandam hlak.
